summary: A young woman and her friends, who've been targeted by kidnappers, must do everything they can to survive after their limo is forced off the road and plunged into a canal.
cast: Jonathan Bennett|Talulah Riley|Rosa Salazar|Samuel Hunt|Cody Christian|Giles Matthey|Denzel Whitaker|Willa Ford|Mario Van Peebles|Tim Daly|Caroline Baudino|Sam Daly|Mario Perez|Cj Stuart|Elycia Rubin|Zedric Harris|Terrence Julien|Joe Ordaz|Jesse Cheever|Brian Tyler Cohen|Lauren See|Erica Souza|Alyce Tawil|Amber Vasquez|Jason Bond
title: Submerged
